steps.title: Call 1 (877) 477-5807 to contact Priceline from the U.S. and Canada.
steps.content: Call 1 (877) 477-5807 to contact Priceline from the U.S . and Canada. You can easily reach Priceline over the phone to help you with general customer service-related concerns or if you want to make a reservation over the phone. Contact Priceline via phone if you need assistance with things like changing or canceling your tickets, travel advisory information, or baggage limits and fees. [1] X Research source You can also dial this number if you have questions related to your reservation, final bill, or special requests. Additionally, 1 (800) PRICELINE also connects you to a customer service line. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Provide your phone number in case the call is disconnected.
steps.content: Provide your phone number in case the call is disconnected. When you make the call, the automatic recording service firsts asks you provide your callback information. Type in your number using the keypad, or say each digit aloud. Then, you’ll redirect to an associate. [3] X Research source This way, the Priceline associate can reconnect with you right away if you lose service or the call drops. If the call disconnects and you don’t have a callback number listed, you may have to explain the situation again to another associate.

steps.title: Locate your Trip Number if calling regarding a current reservation.
steps.content: Locate your Trip Number if calling regarding a current reservation. If you have a flight, rental car, or hotel reserved, you’ll need the Trip Number of the reservation when you call. You can find this number on a confirmation email or by signing into your account. [4] X Research source For instance, locate your Trip Number if calling to change your rental car package.

steps.title: Discuss your question or concern with a Priceline associate.
steps.content: Discuss your question or concern with a Priceline associate. After you provide your callback number, the line automatically connects with the first available Priceline associate. They will ask you for your Trip Number and to describe your question or concern. Politely and respectfully discuss the situation, and the associate can help. For example, say something like, "Hi there. I have a charge on my account but I never finalized the reservation. Can you remove the charge?"

steps.title: Read the Customer Support phone number list if calling from abroad.
steps.content: Read the Customer Support phone number list if calling from abroad. Priceline is mainly based in the U.S. and Canada, though you can make reservations all across the globe. Look over the list of phone numbers to determine the correct number to call. The list is organized by region and country. For example, if you are calling from the U.K, dial 020 7136 8462. In addition, dial 069 5170 9665 if calling from Germany. If you are calling from a country not listed on this site, call +1 212 444 0022. If you made a reservation through Priceline Europe, you can call their partner Active Hotels at +44-20-861-8007. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Call Priceline 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
steps.content: Call Priceline 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Priceline associates are staffed all day every day, and they do not close for holidays. As a result, they can instantly help you with any of your traveling concerns.</ref> For instance, if you can’t find your hotel reservation on Christmas Eve, that’s okay! Call Priceline and they can locate the check-in date and time.

steps.title: Initiate a chat session on their website if you have a general question or concern.
steps.content: Initiate a chat session on their website if you have a general question or concern. You can initiate a chat from either a computer or mobile device by visiting Priceline's Help Page. Priceline’s customer service team is available via chat service for any question or concern you may have. You can chat with Priceline 24/7. For instance, chat with them if you want to mention a room preference or need help changing your flight. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Type in your name and email and select your product from the list.
steps.content: Type in your name and email and select your product from the list. Before you contact an agent, provide them with your first and last name and email address in the respective boxes on the chat link. Then, indicate whether your question or concern is about flights, hotels, packages, profile, cars, or other. Mention if it is regarding an existing reservation, and type a brief sentence or 2 regarding how Priceline can help you. For instance, you can select “Cars” and type, “Hello, there seems to be a price discrepancy between the charge on my card and my confirmation. This is in reference to my rental car scheduled for 8/22.”

steps.title: Explain your question or concern respectfully to the associate.
steps.content: Explain your question or concern respectfully to the associate. As you type your responses to the Priceline associate, use polite, respectful language. Give them as much detail as you can so they can help you to the best of their abilities. This way, you can get the best service possible. [7] X Research source For instance, it is helpful to give the associate your Trip Number and date of reservation.
